subject: Relaxation in upper age limit for key personnel in Supervision Consultancy Services.
text: HR4 <14fl4 <TTHT giferarut T /Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 #4 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (T3+ Ya67 &< ToTA 4714) HT National Highways Authority of India QA. /Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 5i-5 U 6, #qer-10, ETGT, #f faorit_ 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn November 19,2010 POLICY MATTER TECHNICAL (69/2010) (Decision taken on Technical Division File No. NHAIIM-G Road/zoog/CWG) Sub: Relaxation in upper age limit for personnel in Supervision Consultancy Services: Instances have been noticed that Consultants are proposing replacement of personnel including Team Leader for the on-going supervision consultancy assignments by overage candidates in terms of the consultancy agreement owing to various reasons including shortage of trained qualified personnel: 2. The matter has been considered by the competent authority and has decided to relax the upper age limit upto the extent of one year beyond prescribed upper age in exceptional circumstances, provided the proposed duration of deployment is short and the proposed  candidate in replacement is in 'sound health' and found to be fit to discharge his responsibilities effectively. Yoskag  7usoto (M Chandrashekhar) General Manager (Coord) To: AIl Officers of NHAI, HQ AIl EDsIROsISLOIPIUsICMUs Copy for kind information to: PS to Chairman, NHAI PS to all MembersICVO T 7 %I NHAL key key key
